{% load i18n %} {% load static %} {{ settings.APPLICATION_TITLE }} Test Client Success

Success! The OAuth2 access token was granted.

Here are some details....

  • access_token: {{token_response.access_token}}
  • token_type: {{token_response.token_type}}
  • expires_at: {{token_response.expires_at}}
  • expires_in: {{token_response.expires_in}}
  • scope: {{token_response.scope}}
  • patient_id: {{userinfo.patient}}
  • given_name: {{request.user.first_name}}
  • family_name: {{request.user.last_name }}

The access_token and some other values have been saved to the session and will expire in a few minutes. After they expire you will need to go through Authorization process again.

Try some API calls

  • FHIR Patient Everything Bundle 
    curl -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token_response.access_token}}" "{{settings.HOSTNAME_URL}}{% url 'get_patient_fhir_content' %}"
  • FHIR Resource Specific Bundle (Practitioner resource provided as an example) 
    curl -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token_response.access_token}}" "{{settings.HOSTNAME_URL}}{% url 'get_fhir_resource_bundle' 'Practitioner' %}"
  • FHIR VitalSigns Specific Bundle 
    curl -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token_response.access_token}}" "{{settings.HOSTNAME_URL}}{% url 'get_fhir_vital_signs_bundle' %}"
  • FHIR LabResults Bundle 
    curl -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token_response.access_token}}" "{{settings.HOSTNAME_URL}}{% url 'get_fhir_lab_results_bundle' %}"
  • Backlend API Responses 
    curl -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token_response.access_token}}" "{{settings.HOSTNAME_URL}}{% url 'get_backend_api_responses' %}"
  • User Profile 
    curl -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token_response.access_token}}" "{{settings.HOSTNAME_URL}}{% url 'user_profile' %}"
  • OAuth2 Discovery 
    curl "{{settings.HOSTNAME_URL}}{% url 'oauth_authorization_server' %}"
